mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_TEL) VALUES (#{memberId},#{memberName},#{memberPw},#{memberGender},#{memberBirth},#{memberEmail},#{memberAddress},#{memberTel})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_PW = #{memberPw}, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}, MEMBER_TEL = #{memberTel}, MEMBER_ADDRESS = #{memberAddress}, MEMBER_BIRTH = #{memberBirth} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
